item.title: Hackyeaster All Eggs
item.description: I started writing these up as separate posts, but then I figured it’d be neater to post them all in one. So here you go, all the Hacky Easter eggs. Some answers will guide you directly to the eggs, others will require a little bit of work to achieve it. But if you got stuck and are wondering where those missing eggs are, I hope this guide will help you. Egg 0x01 - Just for fun The the first egg is fairly easy.
